SMC_AxisDistanceTransitionParam (FUN)
SMC_AxisDistanceTransitionParam (FUN)
Â¶
FUNCTION SMC_AxisDistanceTransitionParam : ARRAY [0..(SMC_RCNST.MAX_TRANS_PARAMS - 1)] OF LREAL
Sets the transition parameters for distance based blending in axis space
(transition mode
MC_TRANSITION_MODE.TMAxisDistance
).
The output can be connected to the input
TransitionParameter
of the movement function blocks.
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Initial
Comment
Return
SMC_AxisDistanceTransitionParam
ARRAY
[0..(SMC_RCNST.MAX_TRANS_PARAMS
- 1)] OF LREAL
Input
LinearDistance
LREAL
The linear distance in user units. Must be non-negative.
AngularDistance
LREAL
The rotary distance in angular degrees. Must be non-
negative.
Axes
SMC_AxisDistanceAxes
SMC_AxisDistanceAxes.KINEMATIC
Defines which axes are taken into account for axis distance
based blending.
SubMode
SMC_AxisDistanceSubMode
SMC_AxisDistanceSubMode.Maximum
The submode, determines how the distances are interpreted.

rows.Name: LinearDistance
rows.Comment: The linear distance in user units. Must be non-negative.

rows:
The rotary distance in angular degrees. Must be non-
negative.

Defines which axes are taken into account for axis distance
based blending.
The submode, determines how the distances are interpreted.
